Method Detail

createGameNetworkFromGame

public static CIL2PNet createGameNetworkFromGame(util.game.Game game)
Constructs a full CIL2P shef.network using the CIL2P algorithm. This is the method to use when playing a game This method limits the weights of interconnecting neurons to one instead of calculating a value for W, this is Michulke's optimisation First the goal proof trees are creates using the Instantiator class these are sequentially added to the shef.network building a the input and output layers. Finally the shef.network is finalised, this involves connecting the inputs and outputs via a layer of hidden nodes and setting the relevant weights and activations

Parameters:
game - the game this network will represent the goal states for
Returns:
the created shef.network

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Test method will create a network from the top level properties file

Parameters:
args -
